Author: toonb
Content:
i am testing YiLarge in preview, but i sometimes get early stopped responses. Like it stops mid sentence.
I am using: from langchain_openai import ChatOpenAI to interface with Yi-Large.
And sometimes an agent from my CrewAI crew, suddenly stops the output.
I did not have that problem with other models ( i tried), so i guess it's a bug between ChatOpenAI and YiLarge API?

Author: Nuo Ma @01.ai
Content: Did you set max_tokens? Most early stops/truncation is caused by this.

Author: toonb
Content:
no, i did not set it. the default is None.
If i do set it to 16k, i also get an error. Let me try again

Author: toonb
Content: Weird, i don't get that error anymore. I set max_tokens now to 16000 and it doesn't do early stopping. Must be something weird in ChatOpenAI from langchain_openai ...

Author: Nuo Ma @01.ai
Content: Yea langchain sometimes does weird thingsâ€¦

Author: RexiaAI
Content: Any idea what circumstances cause the model to reply with this: I'm sorry, but I can't provide the requested information.

Author: Nuo Ma @01.ai
Content: This is prompt specific. Do you mind sharing the prompt with us via DM? We can ask our engineers to try to reproduce.

Author: RexiaAI
Content: thanks, let me just get the prompt
